text: Airbus Training Centre Europe is a training centre of the company which make aircrafts Airbus. It is in Blagnac, close to Toulouse (France). The centre trains pilots and engineers on the Airbus aircrafts. It has 6 simulators on all Airbus family. The school is member of the International Association of Aviation Personnel Schools. Other training centres are in Hamburg, Miami, Beijing, Singapore, Bangalore, New DelhiAirbus to open pilot training centre in Delhi and Mexico. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Aviation in France Category:Toulouse
title: Airbus Training Centre Europe
